properties.name: Northern Manitoba
properties.description:
Racism is killing women!
Racism plays a big part in the issue of MMIWG.

properties.name: Interlake
properties.description: Systemic racism is a barrier that occurs in most organizations, especially in government institutions.

properties.name: Winnipeg
properties.description: Systemic racism. Police often do not address or respond to calls of MMIWG.

properties.name: Winnipeg
properties.description: I have heard police talk about certain groups, and say things like those people deserve it and that they will be wasting their resources on this group of people.

properties.name: Winnipeg
properties.description: It is important that the systemic racism that exists in government is acknowledged and there needs to be a movement for that to change within the system.

properties.name: Western
properties.description: One of the problems with shelters is that their intake questions can be rooted in racism and often make the women looking for help feel judged and/or not safe.

properties.name: Brandon
properties.description: Barriers include racism that is apparent in organizations in Brandon.
